item.description:
Announcing March 21, Boston Ecademy Meeting (#7)

Diane Darling will be joining us and speaking. Diane is author of the Networking Survival Guide.

Please try to invite 1 or 2 friends to join us for our March Meeting. Last month we had 23 people, this month I am hoping attendance will expand to 30 people!

Mark Doerschlag and Richard Banfield are each responsible for 15-20 minute segments of meeting and Kevin Shea has volunteered to bring the refreshments.

Proposed Agenda:
6:00 - Introductions and Wine & Refreshments
6:20 - Member Agenda Item – Rich Banfield
6:40 - Member Agenda Item - Mark Doerschlag
7:00 - Speed Networking - All
7:20 - Guest Speaker - Diane Darling
7:40 - Boston Ecademy - Phil

Become a member and RSVP "Yes" or "Maybe" by 4:00PM of March 21st and the cost will be $6.00.

Members who do not RSVP will be charged $12.00 at the door. Join today, membership is free!

For non-members, the charge will be $15.00 at the door.

I have decided to offer encouragement for everyone to bring at least one friend. If you invite someone “new” to the meeting and they come, you wil attend for free (assuming you RSVP).

Finally, to get the most out of this meeting, please bring plenty of business cards, fill out your Ecademy Profile and join Boston Ecademy Online.

Thanks so much.

- Phil

For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy March Meetup
